name: The Land of Asktria
description:
There is a land called Asktria. Few have gone there, and those who do have seemingly disappeared. Could you be the one to finally uncover its secrets?

Asktria is a fun and exiting horror game where you fight zombies and clowns, preserve your flashlight,  explore the chilling land of Asktria, and more! Featuring stunning graphics and fast-paced gameplay, Asktria is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat until 2:00 am...or until you meet your fate.

If you enjoy the game, don't hesitate to leave a review! Your reviews help keep these games free!

CONTROLS

WASD

Move Player

SPACE

Jump

LMB

(While making contact with a blue charging station) recharge flashlight

RMB

Toggle flashlight

TAB

Pause

ESC

Free mouse

Hold the center of the flashlight on a zombie to hurt it and drain its health!
